query:
SELECT 
            q.title as "quiz_title!",
            qu.text as "question_text!",
            ua.is_correct,
            ua.created_at as answered_at
        FROM user_answers ua
        JOIN quizzes q ON ua.quiz_id = q.id
        JOIN questions qu ON ua.question_id = qu.id
        WHERE ua.user_id = $1
        ORDER BY ua.created_at DESC
